---
title: BaseContract
icon: square-c
iconType: solid
---

> **注意**: 此页面尚未翻译成中文。以下内容为英文原版。

Creates a new contract connected to target with the abi and optionally connected to a runner to perform operations on
behalf of.

## Implements

- [`Addressable`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/Addressable)
- [`EventEmitterable`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/EventEmitterable)\<[`ContractEventName`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/ContractEventName)\>

## Properties

| Property | Modifier | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `fallback` | `readonly` | `null` \| [`WrappedFallback`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/WrappedFallback) | The fallback or receive function if any. |
| `filters` | `readonly` | `Record`\<`string`, [`ContractEvent`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/ContractEvent)\<`any`[]\>\> | All the Events available on this contract. |
| `interface` | `readonly` | [`Interface`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/Interface) | The contract Interface. |
| `runner` | `readonly` | `null` \| [`ContractRunner`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/ContractRunner) | The connected runner. This is generally a [**Provider**](../interfaces/Provider) or a<br />[**Signer**](../interfaces/Signer), which dictates what operations are supported.<br /><br />For example, a **Contract** connected to a [**Provider**](../interfaces/Provider) may only execute read-only<br />operations. |
| `target` | `readonly` | `string` \| [`Addressable`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/Addressable) | The target to connect to.<br /><br />This can be an address or any [Addressable](../interfaces/Addressable), such as another contract. To get the<br />resolved address, use the `getAddress` method. |

## Methods

### addListener()

```ts
addListener(event, listener): Promise<BaseContract>
```

Alias for [**on**](/cn/sdk/content/classes/BaseContract#on).

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `event` | [`ContractEventName`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/ContractEventName) | The event to listen for. |
| `listener` | [`Listener`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/Listener) | The listener to call when the event is emitted. |

#### Returns

`Promise`\<[`BaseContract`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/BaseContract)\>

### attach()

```ts
attach(target): BaseContract
```

Return a new Contract instance with the same ABI and runner, but a different `target`.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `target` | `string` \| [`Addressable`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/Addressable) | The target to connect to. |

### deploymentTransaction()

```ts
deploymentTransaction(): null | ContractTransactionResponse
```

Return the transaction used to deploy this contract.

This is only available if this instance was returned from a [**ContractFactor**](../classes/ContractFactory).

#### Returns

`null` \| [`ContractTransactionResponse`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/ContractTransactionResponse)

The transaction used to deploy this contract or `null`.

#### Source

[contract/contract.ts:1248](https://github.com/dominant-strategies/quais.js/blob/c1c12d43f9d34c6baad2b0542bd6d0acd6fefcbf/src/contract/contract.ts#L1248)

***

### emit()

```ts
emit(event, ...args): Promise<boolean>
```

Emit an `event` calling all listeners with `args`.

Resolves to `true` if any listeners were called.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `event` | [`ContractEventName`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/ContractEventName) | The event to emit. |
| ...`args` | `any`[] | The arguments to pass to the listeners. |

#### Returns

`Promise`\<`boolean`\>

`true` if any listeners were called.

#### Implementation of

[`EventEmitterable`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/EventEmitterable).[`emit`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/EventEmitterable#emit)

#### Source

[contract/contract.ts:1379](https://github.com/dominant-strategies/quais.js/blob/c1c12d43f9d34c6baad2b0542bd6d0acd6fefcbf/src/contract/contract.ts#L1379)

### getDeployedCode()

```ts
getDeployedCode(): Promise<null | string>
```

Return the deployed bytecode or null if no bytecode is found.

#### Returns

`Promise`\<`null` \| `string`\>

The deployed bytecode or null.

#### Throws

If the runner does not support .provider.

#### Source

[contract/contract.ts:1186](https://github.com/dominant-strategies/quais.js/blob/c1c12d43f9d34c6baad2b0542bd6d0acd6fefcbf/src/contract/contract.ts#L1186)

***

### getEvent()

```ts
getEvent(key): ContractEvent<any[]>
```

Return the event for a given name. This is useful when a contract event name conflicts with a JavaScript name
such as `prototype` or when using a Contract programatically.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `key` | `string` \| [`EventFragment`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/EventFragment) | The name of the event to return. |

#### Returns

[`ContractEvent`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/ContractEvent)\<`any`[]\>

The event for the given name.

#### Source

[contract/contract.ts:1274](https://github.com/dominant-strategies/quais.js/blob/c1c12d43f9d34c6baad2b0542bd6d0acd6fefcbf/src/contract/contract.ts#L1274)

***

### getFunction()

```ts
getFunction<T>(key): T
```

Return the function for a given name. This is useful when a contract method name conflicts with a JavaScript name
such as `prototype` or when using a Contract programatically.

### listenerCount()

```ts
listenerCount(event?): Promise<number>
```

### off()

```ts
off(event, listener?): Promise<BaseContract>
```

Remove the `listener` from the listeners for `event` or remove all listeners if unspecified.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `event` | [`ContractEventName`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/ContractEventName) | The event to remove the listener from. |
| `listener`? | [`Listener`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/Listener) | The listener to remove. |

#### Returns

`Promise`\<[`BaseContract`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/BaseContract)\>

### once()

```ts
once(event, listener): Promise<BaseContract>
```

### queryFilter()

```ts
queryFilter(
   event, 
   fromBlock?, 
toBlock?): Promise<(EventLog | Log)[]>
```

Provide historic access to event data for `event` in the range `fromBlock` (default: `0`) to `toBlock` (default:
`"latest"`) inclusive.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `event` | [`ContractEventName`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/ContractEventName) | The event to query. |
| `fromBlock`? | [`BlockTag`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/BlockTag) | The block to start querying from. |
| `toBlock`? | [`BlockTag`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/BlockTag) | The block to stop querying at. |

#### Returns

`Promise`\<([`EventLog`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/EventLog) \| [`Log`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/Log))[]\>

An array of event logs.

#### Source

[contract/contract.ts:1300](https://github.com/dominant-strategies/quais.js/blob/c1c12d43f9d34c6baad2b0542bd6d0acd6fefcbf/src/contract/contract.ts#L1300)

### waitForDeployment()

```ts
waitForDeployment(): Promise<BaseContract>
```

Resolve to this Contract once the bytecode has been deployed, or resolve immediately if already deployed.

#### Returns

`Promise`\<[`BaseContract`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/BaseContract)\>

The contract instance.

#### Throws

If the contract runner does not support .provider.

[contract/contract.ts:1205](https://github.com/dominant-strategies/quais.js/blob/c1c12d43f9d34c6baad2b0542bd6d0acd6fefcbf/src/contract/contract.ts#L1205)

### from()

```ts
static from<T>(
   target, 
   abi, 
runner?): BaseContract & Omit<T, keyof BaseContract>
```

Create a new BaseContract with a specified Interface.

| :------ | :------ |
| `T` | [`ContractInterface`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/ContractInterface) |

| Parameter | Type | Description |

| `runner`? | `null` \| [`ContractRunner`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/ContractRunner) | The runner to use. |
